sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 17, 2026 –

Bucks Run will be groomed for skate and classic skiing.  The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Outstanding today - perfect groom over 28” hardpack , blue sky , sweet spot timing between 10:30 and 12:30 - simply wonderful!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Classic skied from 12 to 2.  Decent donditions with good tracks.  Areas in shade were really good and sunny spots were slower.  Still nice to get out and do somethng.  Connector still there for now.Hopefully traiil in the woods makes it through the next few warm days.  Maybe we get another week or so iin woods with no connector if all goes well.Thanks for doing what you guys do to keep us going in trying weather conditios.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Skied in the afternoon and found snow cover on golf course was much better than anticipated and most of the groomed tracks were still usable. Sunny areas were soft while shady areas were still moderately icy. Stayed out of the woods assuming trails would be an icy chopped up mess because of all the walkers. Golf course skiing should be reasonable for at least one more day.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Fog is moving around the slopes this morning, but is expected to clear by late morning. The Grooming Crew had to drive slow last night to process the frozen snow surface. Ski conditions are very good on the groomed snow thanks to their attention to detail. The soup of the day is Broccoli and Hominy Chowder. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
